Top 5 Schools Of Nepal 2022

Kathmandu, the capital city of Nepal, is home to some of the top educational institutions in the country. These top schools in Kathmandu are highly recommended for parents and students seeking quality education. Each school has a strong reputation for providing an exceptional academic curriculum with a focus on extracurricular activities. The schools have experienced faculty members who are passionate about education and dedicated to helping students succeed. The schools offer a variety of programs and courses to meet the diverse needs of their students. Parents and students can be assured that by choosing one of these top schools in Kathmandu, they will receive a high-quality education that will prepare them for success in their future endeavors.
Please read the list below for the top 5 schools in Kathmandu.

5. GEMS School

GEMS School is a prestigious educational institution located in Kathmandu, Nepal, known for its exceptional academic program and diverse extracurricular activities. The school offers a comprehensive curriculum that covers preschool through grade 12, and emphasizes a well-rounded education that includes both academic excellence and character development. The faculty at GEMS School are experienced and dedicated professionals who are committed to providing the highest quality education for their students. The curriculum at GEMS School includes core subjects like mathematics, science, and language arts, as well as a wide range of electives and extracurricular activities, including sports, music, art, and drama. The school also provides opportunities for students to participate in community service and leadership activities, which help to foster a sense of social responsibility and civic engagement. With its outstanding academic program, enriching extracurricular activities, and supportive learning environment, GEMS School is an excellent choice for parents seeking a top-quality education for their children.

Further Details

Location:- Dhapakhel, Lalitpur, Kathamndu 44600, Nepal

Official Email:- info@gihe.edu.np

Official Website:- GEMS School

Google Maps-: View on google maps

4. Kendriya Vidhyalaya

Kendriya Vidyalaya Lazimpat is a highly reputable educational institution located in the heart of Kathmandu, Nepal. The school offers a comprehensive academic program that covers kindergarten through grade 12. Kendriya Vidyalaya Lazimpat is renowned for its experienced and dedicated faculty, who are passionate about their work and committed to helping students achieve academic excellence. The curriculum emphasizes a strong foundation in core subjects like mathematics, science, and language arts, while also offering opportunities to explore other areas of interest. Additionally, the school offers a wide range of extracurricular activities, including sports, music, dance, art, and drama, which help students to develop well-rounded personalities. Kendriya Vidyalaya Lazimpat provides a safe and supportive learning environment, where students are encouraged to be curious, confident, and creative. With its outstanding academic program, enriching extracurricular activities, and nurturing atmosphere, Kendriya Vidyalaya Lazimpat is an excellent choice for parents seeking a quality education for their children.

Further Details

Location:- Lazimpat, Kathamndu 44600, Nepal

Official Email:- principalkvkathmandu@gmail.com

Official Website:- Euro School

Google Maps-: View on google maps

3. Alok Vidyashram

Euro School is a highly respected educational institution located in the bustling area of Hadigaon in Kathmandu, Nepal. It offers a comprehensive academic program that covers preschool through grade 12. Euro School is renowned for its excellent teachers, who are passionate about their work and dedicated to helping students succeed. The curriculum emphasizes critical thinking, problem-solving, and communication skills, preparing students for success in both academic and real-world settings. Additionally, the school offers a wide range of extracurricular activities, including sports, music, art, and community service projects, allowing students to explore their interests and develop new talents. Euro School provides a nurturing and supportive learning environment, where students are encouraged to be curious, confident, and compassionate. With its outstanding academic program, experienced faculty, and enriching extracurricular activities, Euro School is an excellent choice for parents seeking a quality education for their children.

Further Details

Location:- Anand Bhirav Marga, Gyaneshwor, Kathamndu 44600, Nepal

Official Email:- alokvidyashram@gmail.com

Official Website:- Alok Vidyashram

Google Maps-: View on google maps

2. Euro School

Euro School is a highly respected educational institution located in the bustling area of Hadigaon in Kathmandu, Nepal. It offers a comprehensive academic program that covers preschool through grade 12. Euro School is renowned for its excellent teachers, who are passionate about their work and dedicated to helping students succeed. The curriculum emphasizes critical thinking, problem-solving, and communication skills, preparing students for success in both academic and real-world settings. Additionally, the school offers a wide range of extracurricular activities, including sports, music, art, and community service projects, allowing students to explore their interests and develop new talents. Euro School provides a nurturing and supportive learning environment, where students are encouraged to be curious, confident, and compassionate. With its outstanding academic program, experienced faculty, and enriching extracurricular activities, Euro School is an excellent choice for parents seeking a quality education for their children.

Further Details

Location:- Ganesh chowk hattigaunda, New Colony, Kathamndu 44600, Nepal

Official Email:- info@euroschool.edu.np

Official Website:- Euro School

Google Maps-: View on google maps

1. Rato Bangala School

Rato Bangala School is a highly respected educational institution in Kathmandu, Nepal, known for its exceptional academic curriculum and strong emphasis on extracurricular activities. The school offers classes from preschool through grade 12, and has a faculty of experienced teachers who are passionate about education and dedicated to helping their students succeed. The school places a strong emphasis on critical thinking and problem-solving skills, and offers a variety of advanced placement courses for students who are ready for more challenging coursework. In addition to its rigorous academic program, Rato Bangala School is also known for its robust extracurricular offerings, which include athletics, music, drama, and community service projects. The school is committed to providing a well-rounded education that prepares students for success in their future endeavors. If you are a parent looking for a school that offers a challenging academic curriculum and a supportive learning environment, Rato Bangala School is an excellent choice.

Further Details

Location:- Lalitpur, patandhoka, 44700 Nepal

Official Email:- rbs@mos.com.np

Official Website:- Rato Bangala School

Google Maps:- View on google maps
